raw akas.title: Μετά τον Εσκομπάρ: Κωδικό όνομα JJ

Surviving Escobar: Alias JJ USA (alternative title)
akas from release info: Μετά τον Εσκομπάρ: Κωδικό όνομα JJ Greece
Surviving Escobar: Alias JJ USA (alternative title)

-1.title: Temporada 1: Capítulo 43, Capítulo 44, Capítulo 45
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: J.J. se entrega a las autoridades con tal de evitar su muerte
1.plot: After committing countless murders, JJ turns himself in to serve time in prison, but an unexpected twist leaves him vulnerable and exposed.

2.title: Alexandra cae en manos de la Fiscalía, mientras J.J. busca alianzas en la cárcel
2.plot: The lives of JJ' s wife and mother-in-law are threatened as Escobar's associates start being murdered.

3.title: J.J. frustra el plan de Abel Mahecha de liberar a '3H' de la cárcel
3.plot: JJ discovers Mahecha's plan to help 3H escape prison. Alexandra is anxious to escape police custody with her mother.

4.title: J.J. se gana la confianza de los paramilitares al liderar un motín
4.plot: JJ offers Mahecha a new plan for 3H's escape. Alexandra seeks medical help for her mother while on the run from authorities.

5.title: Alias J.J. sobrevive a un nuevo atentado y le salva la vida a uno de sus enemigos
5.plot: The investigators interrogate Rosa. The paramilitary prisoners continue to hold hostages and make demands.

6.title: Cegada por su ira, Alexandra decide hablar con las autoridades
6.plot: Alexandra's jealousy overwhelms her loyalty to JJ. Meanwhile, JJ and Mahecha make another attempt at securing 3H's freedom.

7.title: Con la desaparición de 'El Potro' y '3H', J.J. es enviado al calabozo
7.plot: The prison director refuses to publicly reveal that the prisoner head count is off. JJ learns that Alexandra believes he's been unfaithful.

8.title: Los problemas aumentan para J.J. al ser acusado de planear la fuga de '3H'
8.plot: JJ is stabbed in the back as someone turns on him, and the number of enemies he has in prison rises.

9.title: Alexandra le entrega a la Fiscalía el mapa que conduce a la caleta de J.J.
9.plot: Alexandra suffers a loss. Mahecha continues to be at odds with his wife. El Potro revels in what he has discovered

10.title: 'El Potro' se lleva a Alexandra por la fuerza para apartarla de la DEA
10.plot: JJ strikes a deal with Urrego prior to his testimony, but El Potro releases information on the Cartel del Valle that threatens JJ's pact.

11.title: Por escapar del 'Potro', Alexandra expone la vida de su bebé
11.plot: Alexandra and Caspa try to find a hidden stash of money from Escobar's fortune. El Potro looks to form new alliances.

12.title: Alexandra visita a J.J. para contarle que la caleta fue destruida
12.plot: Urrego threatens one of JJ's bodyguards. JJ is badly injured in a gunfight and hospitalized.

13.title: J.J. utiliza información que tiene sobre el Cartel del Valle para salvarse
13.plot: After a murder weapon is discovered in his cell, JJ's prison sentence is extended to 30 years. He takes out his anger on Alexandra.

14.title: El Potro' logra su cometido y pone en riesgo la vida de J.J. en la cárcel
14.plot: JJ conducts an interview with a media outlet to make accusations against politicians and government officials.

15.title: Alexandra y 'Caspa' inician la búsqueda de una caleta de Pablo Escobar
15.plot: Clements suspects that the soccer tournament requested by the prisoners is not as innocent as it seems. Alexandra gets closer to Gabriel.

16.title: J.J. hace un trato con Urrego para que le deje la vida en paz
16.plot: The break-in at Clemente's house gets him closer to uncovering who is smuggling drugs into the prison.

17.title: J.J. se salva de un atentado en la cárcel, pero queda gravemente herido
17.plot: Gabriel is invited to sing at Urrego's 50th birthday at the prison and is confronted by JJ about his affair. Galeno attempts an escape.

18.title: Para blindarse en la cárcel, J.J. hace grandes denuncias en una entrevista
18.plot: JJ's lawyer threatens Alexandra with imprisonment if she snitches on her husband. The media air news about Gabriel's involvement with authorities.

19.title: J.J. encuentra la forma de ingresar droga a la cárcel y aliarse con Urrego
19.plot: Urrego and JJ try to get Bachué drunk, hoping he'll admit he kidnapped the ex-president's brother.

20.title: J.J. enfurece al enterarse de que Alexandra le es infiel con otro hombre
20.plot: JJ plots to rescue the ex-president's brother by having the government help him escape prison with Bachué. Will the plan work?

21.title: Galeno y J.J. aprovechan la fiesta de Urrego para emprender su plan de fuga
21.plot: JJ's latest prison reduction deal is put at risk. Meanwhile, a young woman becomes enamored with him and visits the ex-hit man.

22.title: La abogada de J.J. se convierte en su carta de salvación
22.plot: Urrego fears his punishment for assaulting a nurse. JJ tries to strike a peace deal between the paramilitary and guerilla leaders.

23.title: Toledo no llega a ningún acuerdo con J.J. y sus planes se frustran
23.plot: Mónica gets involved in the negotiations between the paramilitary and guerillas. Urrego questions his wife about El Potro.

24.title: J.J. recibe una rebaja de pena al colaborar en un operativo de rescate
24.plot: Mónica works hard to try to get JJ transferred back from Valledupar prison. Things get heated between her and Clemente.

25.title: ¿Nuevo amor? J.J., se involucra con una joven que lo visita a la cárcel
25.plot: Urrego and JJ come to an agreement on how to deal with El Potro. Danilo Pineda is offered a plea bargain in exchange for spying on JJ.

26.title: J.J. busca acabar la guerra en la cárcel para evitar su trasladol
26.plot: Urrego is told he is being extradited to the United States and tells Mónica he feels betrayed by her. JJ seeks Jennifer's help.

27.title: J.J. es trasladado a Valledupar a pesar de los esfuerzos de su abogada
27.plot: Cecilia and Clemente argue over her brother's actions. JJ wants to start selling acid as part of his drug business.

28.title: ¿Cumplirán?, Galeno y Mahecha firman un tratado de paz en la cárcel

imdb.title: Alias J.J.
plot: As the Medellin Cartel crumbles, Pablo Escobar's No.1 hit man struggles to stay alive and gain respect in the prison hierarchy.
